name: Chicken Stir Fry
instructions: 1. Cook rice according to package. 2. Cut chicken into cubes. 3. Stir fry chicken in hot oil. 4. Add vegetables and cook 5 min. 5. Add soy sauce, garlic, ginger. 6. Serve over rice.

name: Vegetarian Pasta Primavera
instructions: 1. Cook pasta al dente. 2. Sauté vegetables in olive oil. 3. Add garlic and cook 1 min. 4. Toss with pasta. 5. Top with basil and parmesan.

name: Grilled Salmon with Vegetables
instructions: 1. Season salmon with salt, pepper, lemon. 2. Grill 6-8 min per side. 3. Toss asparagus with olive oil and garlic. 4. Grill vegetables 10 min. 5. Serve together.

name: Thai Green Curry
ingredients: chicken,coconut milk,green curry paste,bamboo shoots,bell pepper,basil,rice
instructions: 1. Cook rice. 2. Sauté curry paste in pan. 3. Add coconut milk and bring to simmer. 4. Add chicken and vegetables. 5. Cook 15 min. 6. Serve over rice with basil.

name: Quinoa Buddha Bowl
instructions: 1. Cook quinoa. 2. Roast sweet potato cubes at 400°F for 25 min. 3. Massage kale with lemon. 4. Assemble bowl with quinoa, chickpeas, sweet potato, kale, avocado. 5. Drizzle tahini dressing.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: 1. Brown ground beef. 2. Season with taco seasoning. 3. Warm tortillas. 4. Assemble tacos with beef and toppings.

name: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: 1. Sauté onion and garlic. 2. Add rice and toast 2 min. 3. Add wine and stir until absorbed. 4. Gradually add broth, stirring constantly. 5. Add mushrooms halfway through. 6. Finish with butter and parmesan.

name: Lentil Soup
instructions: 1. Sauté onion, carrots, celery. 2. Add garlic and spices. 3. Add lentils, tomatoes, broth. 4. Simmer 30 min until lentils tender. 5. Season to taste.

name: Greek Chicken Bowl
instructions: 1. Cook rice. 2. Grill seasoned chicken. 3. Dice vegetables. 4. Assemble bowl with rice, chicken, vegetables, feta, olives. 5. Top with tzatziki.

name: Veggie Burger
instructions: 1. Mash black beans. 2. Mix with cooked quinoa, onion, garlic, cumin, bread crumbs, egg. 3. Form patties. 4. Pan fry 5 min per side. 5. Serve on bun with toppings.

name: Shrimp Scampi
instructions: 1. Cook pasta. 2. Sauté garlic in butter. 3. Add shrimp and cook until pink. 4. Add wine and lemon. 5. Toss with pasta and parsley.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
instructions: 1. Grill chicken breast. 2. Chop romaine lettuce. 3. Toss lettuce with dressing. 4. Top with sliced chicken, parmesan, croutons.

name: Sweet Potato Curry
instructions: 1. Cook rice. 2. Sauté onion, garlic, ginger. 3. Add curry powder. 4. Add sweet potato cubes and coconut milk. 5. Simmer 20 min. 6. Add chickpeas and spinach. 7. Serve over rice.

name: Pork Chops with Apples
instructions: 1. Season pork chops. 2. Sear in hot pan 4 min per side. 3. Remove and set aside. 4. Sauté onion and apples. 5. Add broth and thyme. 6. Return pork to pan and simmer 10 min.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
instructions: 1. Slice eggplant and salt to remove moisture. 2. Dip in egg, then bread crumbs. 3. Fry until golden. 4. Layer in baking dish with marinara and cheese. 5. Bake at 375°F for 30 min.

name: Teriyaki Chicken
instructions: 1. Cook rice. 2. Mix soy sauce, honey, garlic, ginger for teriyaki sauce. 3. Cook chicken in pan. 4. Add sauce and simmer. 5. Steam broccoli. 6. Serve chicken over rice with broccoli and sesame seeds.

name: Falafel Wrap
instructions: 1. Blend chickpeas, onion, garlic, spices. 2. Form into balls. 3. Fry until golden. 4. Warm pita. 5. Fill with falafel, vegetables, tahini sauce.

name: Beef Stew
instructions: 1. Brown beef chunks. 2. Add vegetables and sauté. 3. Add broth, tomato paste, thyme. 4. Simmer 2 hours until beef tender. 5. Season to taste.

name: Caprese Salad
instructions: 1. Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. 2. Arrange alternating on plate. 3. Add basil leaves. 4. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic. 5. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Chicken Fried Rice
instructions: 1. Cook rice and cool. 2. Scramble egg and set aside. 3. Cook chicken. 4. Add vegetables. 5. Add rice and soy sauce. 6. Mix in egg and green onion.
